snippet.title: Rise of Civilizations Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Rise of Civilizations is a mobile MMO real-time epic strategy game inspired by history.

Get it on Google Play ► https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/riseofcivili...

In Rise of Civilizations, you’ll find a seamless and highly detailed world map, with 8 civilizations and more than 20 historical heroes to choose from. Each has specialty troops and buildings with unique upgrades. You’ll also research technologies from various eras, join alliances, and manage the growth of your cities.

Lead your civilization to glory!
